description: iWorld Atlas Lite features the most complete socio-economic facts (Geography,Demography,Economy,Government) of the most 40 known countries of the world ,9 continents. More than 1350 key facts and 100 large and high detailed maps with Googlemap plugin. Flag description, Coat of Arms, national motto, Conversion tables, ... All you want to know about the World. For more informations, screenshots, ... visit www.ze-palm.com  Go ahead to iWorld Atlas, the most complete atlas of 224 countries. www.ze-palm.com  List of the 40 countries : AFRICA : South Africa, Gabon, Kenya, Morocco, Seychelles, Chad, Tunisia ASIA : Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Japan,  Thailand EUROPE : Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Holy See, Ireland, Italy, Monaco, Portugal, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom MIDDLE EAST : Afghanistan, Iran, Saudi Arabia NORTH AMERICA: Canada, Cuba, Guadeloupe, Martinique, Mexico, United States OCEANIA : Fiji, New Caledonia, New Zealand, Papua New Guinea SOUTH AMERICA:  Argentina, Brazil, French Guiana
